Beachcomber:  




Beachcomber entered the armory of the Ark, taking out a heavy laser rifle.  
Setting the rifle down after getting some power cells for it, he took out a 
chain gun.  Taking out two bandoliers of shells and wrapping them around one 
shoulder and across the chest in one direction, the other in an opposite 
direction.  Putting the chain gun in subspace, he picked up the heavy laser 
rifle, taking two grenades and putting them in subspace, stepping to the 
side, he waited for the others on guard duty to get weapons.
